flawed_nl_solution:
Darius poured the 13-ounce bucket into the first large bucket because 23 - 10 = 13
The second large bucket contains 38 ounces because 11 + 12 + 16 = <<11+12+16=38>>38
#### 38

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 39, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
